name: ThankThank Notes
overview:
ThankThank Notes sends handwritten notes in minutes.

In a nutshell, the company has a web app that businesses and consumers use to order handwritten notes. After receiving an order, the ThankThank Notes staff hand-writes, stuffs, stamps and mails the notes. People use ThankThank Notes when they want to send handwritten notes to new clients or prospects as well as for social events like baby showers, weddings and holiday cards.

ThankThank Notes was started by a group of entrepreneurs in Austin, Texas. The founders send every new customer a handwritten thank you note when they subscribe to their different companies’ web apps or services. Even after hearing again and again how much their users appreciate receiving a handwritten note, it was still hard to set aside time in their busy schedules to write notes. So the founders built the ThankThank web app to streamline the process of sending notes and to free themselves to focus on revenue generating activities.
